subject: Dear  Sir,
body:
Dear  Sir,
How are you this morning?
 I expected your urgent response to the outstanding payment to enable us to complete this transaction as time is running out.
Contact  Mr. JOHN MARK   Telephone and WhatsAppLine  : +32-495-710-424 /  , also give him your exact traveling date / arrival to Belgium and he will send you the address  and time  and how to meet.
R.J.C. Wolfgang
Transaction Investigator
Auditors & Financial Flow
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The contents of this email message and any attachments are intended solely for the addressee(s) and may contain confidential and/or privileged information and may be legally protected from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient of this message or their agent, or if this message has been addressed to you in error, please immediately alert the sender by reply by email and then delete this message and any attachments. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use, dissemination, copying, or storage of this message or its attachments is strictly prohibited.

subject: Re: Dear  Sir,
body:
Dear Wolfgang,

I hope this email finds you well. Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm curious about the payment you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about what it is for and why it is urgent? I want to make sure I understand the situation correctly.

Also, who is Mr. John Mark? Is he someone I should be in contact with regarding this payment? It would be helpful if you could provide more information about him and his role in this process.

Thank you in advance for your response.

Best wishes,
Tracy

body:
Hello! I hope you are doing well. Could you please provide more details about the payment and the purpose of it? I would like to understand the situation better before proceeding. Thank you for reaching out.

Best wishes,
